name: Bagman: Cash or Clash!
description:
** The browser version above is a demo. If you like this game please purchase the full version. Thanks!

Survive high-speed pursuits and collect protection money for your boss.

Do you have what it takes to be the bagman?
Survive the hordes of police cars chasing you and collect as many money bags and suitcases as you can to unlock new vehicles and locations. Use power-ups to shoot the police cars and avoid being busted. How long can you survive?


Installation instructions:

  • Windows:
    • Compressed ZIP version: Extract the zip file and run Bagman.exe.
    • Installer version: Double click the bagman_installer.exe file and follow the instructions.
  • Mac:
    • Extract the zip file and drag to the Applications folder

Keyboard shortcuts:

  • Left arrow = Turn left
  • Right arrow = Turn right
  • Down arrow = Brake
  • Enter = Start level
  • R = Restart level
  • B = Back
  • Alt+F4 (Windows) or Command+Q (Mac)  = Quit

Enjoy!
